trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Howell
There were no other sightings in Howell on or around July 14th 1966
divs: Sighting DetailsTaking a troop of boy scouts for a campout in woods on farm land. Group was out together playing game when suddenly in place of darkness the entire area was entirely lit as if it was daytime! It lasted only a few seconds but all were dumbfounded. Since we were in an area without lights there was no explanation for the sudden light. To this day we have wondered what that was.
